data.title: The History and antiquities of the town and county of the town of Newcastle upon Tyne ... ; v.1 / by John Brand.
data.meta_description: This book, written by the Newcastle antiquarian John Brand, covers the history of the town from its establishment as a Roman fortification on Hadrians Wall through to the mid-eighteenth century. Eighteenth-century Newcastle was one of several towns in Britain undergoing immense change due to technological advances in agriculture and industry and Brands account provides a useful insight into how the town appeared at this time.Brand was an avid collector of information and his works often suffered from a...
